name: Voids and Vessels (Demo)
description:
Voids and Vessels (SAGE 2021 Demo):

Voids and Vessels will have you face off as a magical Dummy against an opposing Dummy. Each of you are equipped with the Art Magic elements of Fire, Darkness and Water; each element having a slight advantage over another. Use your directional inputs to master these elements and dish out massive damage, change the weather and defeat the enemy dummy, asserting your dummy dominance in magical combat!

Characters

Dummy: That's you. (No literally, you play as the Dummy.)
Enemy Dummy: An imposter; teach them who's boss!

Controls:

WSAD/ Up-Down-Left-Right: Movement/Navigation
Space: Select/Skip
Enter: Pause
Backspace: Deselect/Go Back

(O: Does Something cool.)
